DOC.brief_summary: 1 . To demonstrate clinically significant improvement patient undergo lumbar interlaminar epidural . Improvement assess relation clinical outcome measure pain function . 2 . To evaluate compare adverse event profile patient .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Chronic Low Back Lower Extremity Pain
DOC.criteria: Subjects least 18 year age Subjects history chronic , functionlimiting chronic low back pain least 6 month duration Subjects able give voluntary , write informed consent participate investigation Subjects , opinion PI , able understand investigation , cooperate investigational procedure , willing return center require postoperative followup Subjects recent surgical procedure within last 3 month . Cauda Equina symptom and/or compressive radiculopathy Narcotic use great hydrocodone 100 mg/day , methadone 60 mg , morphine 180 mg , dose equivalent Uncontrolled major depression uncontrolled psychiatric disorder Uncontrolled acute medical illness include coagulopathy , renal insufficiency , chronic liver dysfunction , progressive neurological deficit , urinary sphincter dysfunction , infection , increase intracranial pressure , pseudotumor cerebri , intracranial tumor , unstable angina , severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . Chronic severe condition could interfere interpretation outcome assessment pain bodily function Women pregnant lactating Subjects participate clinical study investigational product within 30 day enrollment Patients multiple complaint involve concomitant hip osteoarthritis , due overlap pain complaint Inability achieve appropriate positioning inability understand inform consent protocol History adverse reaction local anesthetic antiinflammatory drug history gastrointestinal bleeding ulcer Previous surgery .
